p: A.ascalonicum methanolic extract decreased blood glucose level in alloxan diabetic rats in a way that resembles the hypoglycemic action of glibenclamide. In the long-term period, the effect of the reduction in blood glucose was similar to that of metformin. The Allium genus is rich in flavonoids that can inhibit the enzymes responsible for the controlling of gluconeogenesis, glucokinase and glucose 6-phosphatase, and can increase the storage of glucose in the liver with a reduction of glycogen breakdown [ 166].
